definition: in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: The jasmine’s lisping of love to the sun is her flowers.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉呢喃着用花朵来表达对太阳的爱恋。

sentences.english: And to mother-care-earth under my feet training me how to love, only my gratitude remains.
sentences.chinese: 而对于培养自己爱恋的土地，我只有感恩。

sentences.english: The fluctuating love disappears in the spring suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 浮浮沉沉的爱恋骤然消失在春天。

sentences.english: Times and times, The gone- by train took away my best loves.
sentences.chinese: 多少次，路过的列车带走我曾经的爱恋。

sentences.english: In fact, sometimes miss the little love that nursery.
sentences.chinese: 其实有时候怀念那幼儿班的小爱恋。

sentences.english: He breathed words of love into her ear.
sentences.chinese: 他轻声在她耳畔倾吐爱恋之言。

sentences.english: The dancer was enamoured of the princess.
sentences.chinese: 这名舞蹈演员爱恋着公主。

sentences.english: "Climate change is already altering the character of the places we know and love," Hayhoe says.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化早已在改变我们熟悉和爱恋的土地的特征。

sentences.english: For my Ma, I have a boundless love.
sentences.chinese: 对于我的马子，我有无限的爱恋。

sentences.english: Love is always my gift to you.
sentences.chinese: 爱恋永远是我给你的礼物。

sentences.english: Since then, this paragraph of deep-rooted love only by more people know.
sentences.chinese: 自此，这段刻骨铭心的爱恋才被更多的人知道。

sentences.english: Therefore, to them, playing with love is more inclined to attract women's eyes and is easily hated by them as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而四十岁是男人最受女人爱恋，也最易遭女人痛恨。

sentences.english: I paint you and fashion  you ever with my love longings.
sentences.chinese: 我永远用爱恋的渴想来描画你。

sentences.english: After Anna returns to Britain, the couple try to keep things going.
sentences.chinese: 安娜回到英国后，两人试着保持爱恋。

sentences.english: I will not gainsay love, called love forsooth.
sentences.chinese: 我真不否认所谓的爱恋。

sentences.english: He was infatuated with the beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 他疯狂地爱恋着那个漂亮的姑娘。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
to be enamored of/to have tender feelings for/to be sentimentally attached to (a person or place)
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
